      • setup

      • getHosts

        public String[] getHosts()
        Gives the pxGrid hosts the client can connect to.
        Returns:

      • setHosts

        public void setHosts(String[] hosts)
        (Required) Specify the list of pxGrid hostnames/ipaddess in the pxGrid cluster. The API attempts to connect to the first host in the list. If the connection is not successful, connection to the second pxGrid node is attempted.
        Parameters:
        hosts -

      • getUserName

        public String getUserName()

      • setUserName

        public void setUserName(String userName)
        (Required) Sets the username of the client node. As pxGrid supports auto-registration, the account gets created in pxGrid if the account corresponding to the username does not exist provided the certificates are valid.
        Parameters:
        userName -

      • getPassword

        public String getPassword()

      • setPassword

        public void setPassword(String password)

      • getGroup

        public String getGroup()

      • setGroup

        public void setGroup(String group)
        (Optional) Sets the access group that the user wants to be part of. By default, the user is put into “Basic” group which is the least access level group. Please note that this parameter just specifies the node’s intent to be part of a particular group at the time of account creation. The system administrator can change it at any time. Currently supported groups are “Basic”, “Session” and “EPS”.
        Parameters:
        group -
